remarks: Inference similar to Theorem 19.23 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 21-Apr-2013.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
exlimexi.1 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
exlimexi.2 $e |- ( E. x ph -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
exlimexi $p |- ( E. x ph -> ps ) $.
